programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.

programme.title: Kuchh Meetha Ho Jaye
programme.desc: When a flight delays indefinitely 40 odd passengers are stranded at the airport. This inconvenience soon becomes a blessing in disguise as couples of all ages get a chance to shed a light on their relationships.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: A family of five is separated in an unfortunate incident. The three brothers are raised in different religious households. As fate would have it, the family reunites after several years and avenges those responsible for their separation.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: The life of a suicidal industrialist takes a sharp turn when he meets a spirited chatterbox on a train journey in this breezy Bollywood romantic comedy.
